description:
Designed for daily use, Palmolive Body Butter Coconut Scrub Shower Gel renews your skin surface for beautifully radiant skin.

The ultra creamy body wash formula infused with real apricot seeds gently exfoliates for skin that feels soft and smooth.

Indulge with this tropical blend of creamy coconut and juicy fresh notes.

Please recycle us! This bottle is recyclable.

Size: 750mL Body Butter Shower Scrub



Product Features:

  • BODY BUTTER SHOWER SCRUB: Palmolive Body Butter Coconut Scrub Exfoliating Body Wash is enriched with real apricot seeds.
  • BEAUTIFUL SKIN: Renews the skin surface for beautiful, radiant skin
  • TROPICAL SCENT: Indulge with this tropical blend of creamy coconut and juicy fresh notes.
  • DAILY USE: Shower gel suitable for daily use on all skin types.
  • RECYCLABLE: Palmolive Body Butter Body Wash are made with a recyclable bottle
name: Palmolive 750ML
